projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Webpage containing all a list of all the developer technologies I am familiar with and all the significant project I have contributed to.

projects.title: Readability
projects.description: Mobile application (Android/iOS) which captures text using the device's camera, recognizes it using Firebase ML Kit and sends it to an Bluetooth conected embedded Arduino device which converts it letter by letter to braille alphabet.

projects.title: We-will-develop-it-later
projects.description: But maybe, just maybe, we will finish it one day :)

projects.title: Projectblank
projects.description: This repository contains the game contents for Project Blank, a contestant in the HackTUESx30 programing competition.

projects.title: Textartstudio
projects.description: Simple web-hosted tool for creation of art using ASCII characters and exporting it to clipboard for later use.
